DOC.detailed_description: Effective implementation evidence-based practice ( EBPs ) address complex widespread public health issue , substance use disorder ( SUDs ) HIV , remain substantial challenge . Leadership organizational context associate implementation climate attitude toward EBP , well clinical outcome client satisfaction quality life . While many leadership development approach , often base empirically support approach curriculum , specifically design develop strategic climate EBP implementation . This project address concern advance implementation science test effect Leadership Organizational Change Implementation ( LOCI ) intervention . The goal LOCI intervention improve general leadership implementation leadership utilize organizational strategy create positive strategic organizational climate EBP implementation . These lead positive SUD treatment provider attitude behavior support EBP implementation outcomes intervention fidelity implementation process . Consistent Exploration , Preparation , Implementation , Sustainment ( EPIS ) conceptual framework , LOCI create change multiple level within provider organization ( e.g. , executives/mid- manager , workgroup leader , service provider ) foster context supportive EBP implementation sustainment . Initial support feasibility , acceptability , utility LOCI intervention successfully demonstrate NIH support pilot study ( R21MH082731 , PI : Aarons ) . The propose study test whether LOCI achieve change outcomes general implementation leadership , implementation climate , implementation process , EBP fidelity SUD treatment agency . Seventy-two workgroup leader provider ( i.e. , subordinate ) randomize either LOCI condition webinar control condition . All direct SUD treatment provider condition receive train Motivational Interviewing ( MI ) , lead EBP SUD HIV prevention treatment . The test LOCI occur within four agency provide SUD treatment multiple site across California . The test LOCI intervention include SUD service provider ( n=320 ) , workgroup leader ( n=60 ) , agency executives/mid-managers ( n=16 ) . Hypotheses tested compare LOCI control group outcomes leadership , implementation climate , psychological safety climate , provider attitude behavior , MI fidelity , implementation process . The propose study provide practical implementation strategy utilized improve workgroup leadership strategic climate EBP implementation .
